title: Soccer fonts
content:
Hi,

I am hoping to put the proper fonts from soccer teams into my favourite video game.

I've collected the numbers in the attached pic, it should have 0-9 can anyone tell me what font it is, or even a close font.

On the blue and white pic, there are 2 fonts here, the WHITE-ON-BLUE is font one (sort of Italic, offset); the BLACK-ON-WHITE is font two (big rounded numbers).

On the red and white pic there is just one font, it seems strange because the characters are sort of cut (e.g. top of “1”).

Any help would be great.

Thanks,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101107074342im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0a35fb39e6a73dd4ea5926542e4dd1e2_44410_5965.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101107074342im_/http:/typophile.com/files/64ce4e191349dc2495841c7f20869f8c_27129_6091.jpg)
author: edmundo
